description: Having had enough of his nephew's troublemaking, Uncle Jason Branch kidnaps young Tristian Paris in the middle of the night and blindfolds him. Jason puts Tristian on his knees to service three studly friends, Aron Ridge, Jack Simmons, and Mitchell Stack. The three studly Black men take turns using Tristian's hole before Uncle Jason finally gets in a taste of Tristian's hole.
title: Phoenix Rising
